questions.question: BUZZ LIGHTYEAR’S ENEMY, WHO YOU TRY TO DEFEAT IN SPACE RANGER SPIN.
THIS PENGUIN IS NOW AN ANIMATRONIC AT THE END OF THE SLINKY DOG DASH COASTER IN TOY STORY LAND.
IN TOY STORY 3, ANDY’S TOYS ARE WELCOMED TO SUNNYSIDE DAYCARE BY THIS BEAR.
THE FIRST DISNEY ANIMATED CHARACTER THIS ACTOR VOICED WAS IN TOY STORY, THOUGH BEFORE THAT HE DID APPEAR IN THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF DISNEY AS HIS FAMOUS CHARACTER, CLIFF CLAVIN.
SARAH MCLACHLAN PROVIDED JESSIE’S SINGING VOICE IN TOY STORY 2, BUT HER SPEAKING VOICE IN 2, 3, AND THE UPCOMING 4 IS PROVIDED BY THIS ACTRESS.
COUNTRY BEAR JAMBOREE
KALI RIVER RAPIDS
STAR TOURS - THE ADVENTURE CONTINUES
GADGET’S GO COASTER

APRIL 22, 1998 (EARTH DAY)

questions.answer: What is Snow White’s Scary Adventures?

questions.question: THE CALIFORNIA GRILL
questions.answer: What is the Top of the World?

questions.question: SHE ASKED FOR HER ANIMATRONIC, BUT ALL SHE GOT WAS THIS.
AFTER A TWITTER RANT RESULTED IN HER SHOW’S CANCELLATION, BOB IGER TWEETED, "THERE WAS ONLY ONE THING TO DO HERE, AND THAT WAS THE RIGHT THING."
SHE WAS ORIGINALLY IN TALKS WITH THE DISNEY COMPANY FOR CREATING A THEMED LAND BASED AROUND HER BOOKS - IT WOULD HAVE MADE SENSE, GIVEN HOW MUCH DISNEY LIKES BUILDING CASTLES.
THIS ACTOR WAS RATHER UPSET AT THE ABRUPT CANCELLATION OF ABC’S "CASTLE" - ALTHOUGH HE SEEMS TO HAVE PUT THAT BEHIND HIM, SINCE HE’LL BE STARRING IN ABC’S NEW SERIES "THE ROOKIE" ONCE IT DEBUTS.
THIS ACTOR ENDED UP FEUDING WITH DISNEY ANIMATION OVER HOW THEY ADVERTISED THE MOVIE HE WAS IN - SPECIFICALLY, THAT THEY PROMOTED HIS ROLE IN THE FILM TOO WELL.
TOM MIGHT TEACH FAKE COURSES ON WRITING CLICKBAIT HEADLINES, BUT YOU CAN TAKE REAL COURSES ON EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE AND LEADERSHIP EXCELLENCE HERE.
OVER THE COURSE OF THIS ATTRACTION, GUESTS GET TO SEE MANY LANDMARKS SUCH AS THE MATTERHORN, THE GREAT WALL OF CHINA, AND THE EIFFEL TOWER.
questions.answer: What is Soarin' Around the World?

questions.question: THIS ATTRACTION TAKES YOU THROUGH THE COURSE OF HUMAN HISTORY.
TRY THE 10-COURSE CHEF’S TASTING MENU AT THIS FIVE-DIAMOND RESTAURANT.
DISNEY HAS SEVERAL GOLF COURSES, BUT THIS IS THE ONLY ONE WHERE YOU CAN PLAY FOOTGOLF.
questions.answer: What is Disney’s Oak Trail Golf Course.

questions.question: WHEN IS YOUR DISNEY BUS COMING? SOON YOU'LL BE ABLE TO CHECK THIS APP - IF IT’S NOT EXPERIENCING AN OUTAGE.
TAKE THIS BUS FROM THE ORLANDO AIRPORT TO YOUR WALT DISNEY WORLD RESORT.
SICK OF WAITING FOR THE BUS? BOOK YOURSELF ONE OF THESE DISNEY-RUN VEHICLES FROM YOUR LYFT APP.
THIS IS THE ONE PARK YOU CAN’T REACH BY DISNEY BUS FROM FORT WILDERNESS.
USED FOR GUEST TRANSPORTATION AND SHOWS, THIS STYLE OF BUS WAS SEEN AROUND WORLD SHOWCASE.

double-jeopardy.name: I THINK I’M A CLONE NOW

questions.question: THE MOVIE SOLO MAKES A REFERENCE TO THIS PLANET WHICH GUESTS AT HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS WILL SOON BE ABLE TO VISIT LATE NEXT YEAR.
THE BATTLE ESCAPE ATTRACTION WILL PUT YOU IN THE MIDDLE OF A BATTLE BETWEEN THE RESISTANCE AND THIS GROUP.
THE NAME OF THE VILLAGE (NOT THE PLANET) WE’LL VISIT IN GALAXY’S EDGE.
THE SIXTH VERSION OF THIS REEDPOP RUN STAR WARS CONVENTION WHICH TRAVELS AROUND THE NATION WAS HELD IN ORLANDO IN 2012, NOT TOO FAR FROM THE TOWN OF THE SAME NAME.
IN STAR TOURS: THE ADVENTURE CONTINUES, PASSENGERS BOARD THIS MODEL OF VEHICLE.
THIS OLD KEY WEST RESTAURANT IS KNOWN FOR ITS CONCH CHOWDER.
TRY THE CHEESECAKE IN A JAR AT THIS MAGIC KINGDOM RESTAURANT THAT REOPENED IN 2016.
SNACK ON BANANA CHEESECAKE EGG ROLLS AT THIS WORLD SHOWCASE TABLE-SERVICE LOCATION.
BACON IS EVEN BETTER WHEN IT’S SERVED ON A CLOTHESLINE, LIKE AT THIS DISNEY SPRINGS ESTABLISHMENT.
WHILE KUNGALOOSH IS BEST KNOWN AS A DRINK MADE FAMOUS BY THE ADVENTURER’S CLUB, IT’S ALSO THE NAME OF A DESSERT AT THIS MAGIC KINGDOM THEMED RESTAURANT.
PETE GOT THE FIRST EVER WDWNT JEOPARDY QUESTION RIGHT, IDENTIFYING THIS SPINNING ADVENTURELAND ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is the Magic Carpets of Aladdin?

questions.question: PETE COULDN’T GIVE THE NAME OF THIS DINOSAUR IN HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS THAT SERVES ICE CREAM AND INCORRECTLY DESCRIBED IT AS BLOCKING THE CHINESE THEATER.
PETE THOUGHT THAT THIS EPCOT ICON WAS FOR THE SEAS. IT'S ACTUALLY FOR THIS ATTRACTION.
PETE THOUGHT THAT JIMMY CARTER WAS AT THE OPENING OF DISNEYLAND, BUT REALLY, IT WAS THIS FUTURE PRESIDENT.
PETE CALLED THE MEMORIAL "SHARING THE MAGIC" FEATURING THIS PERSON AND MINNIE MOUSE AS "ALMOST PARTNERS".
IN SCI-FI DINE IN'S FILM LOOP, THERE IS A MONTAGE OF CLIPS SET TO THIS TUNE ABOUT A CYCLOPEAN, HORNED, AERIFORM, CARNIVOROUS BEAST THAT REFLECTS LIGHT AT A WAVELENGTH OF AROUND 400NM.
questions.answer: What is (a/the) one-eyed, one-horned, flying purple people eater?

questions.question: IN ONE OF THE INTERMISSION BREAKS AT SCI-FI, A CLOCK IS DISPLAYED WARNING YOU THAT THIS IS YOU "LAST CHANCE TO VISIT THE SNACK BAR BEFORE THE NEXT SHOW", WHILE THIS SONG BY THE DELL VIKINGS PLAYS IN THE BACKGROUND.
questions.answer: What is Come and Go With Me?

questions.question: THIS MOVIE, DUBBED THE "WORST FILM EVER MADE" BY THE BOOK THE GOLDEN TURKEY AWARDS, WAS BELA LUGOSI’S LAST CREDITED FILM ROLE, AND HAS BEEN RIFFED ON BY BOTH THE FILM CREW AND RIFFTRAX.
questions.answer: What is Plan 9 from Outer Space?

questions.question: INCLUDED IN SCI-FI'S FILM LOOP IS A TRAILER FOR WHAT IS POSSIBLY THE LEAST AMBITIOUS CROSSOVER EVENT IN HISTORY, WHERE THIS CLASSIC UNIVERSAL MONSTER MEETS A CREATURE KNOWN ONLY AS "THE SPACE MONSTER".

ALSO FEATURED IN SCI-FI IS THE CARTOON "THE CAT THAT HATED PEOPLE", WITH THE TITULAR CAT VOICED BY FRED QUIMBY, AND DIRECTED BY THIS MAN, WHO IS FAR MORE FAMOUS FOR HIS WORK WITH THE LOONEY TUNES CHARACTERS.
THIS LOCATION WAS FEATURED PROMINENTLY IN TOY STORY 2, DUE TO IT BEING OWNED AND OPERATED BY THE MAIN ANTAGONIST.
THE SPINNER RIDE IN ADVENTURELAND IS THEMED TO THIS DISNEY MOVIE.
NOW AN EXTINCT ATTRACTION, THIS IS THE ONLY SHOW IN DISNEY PARKS HISTORY TO FEATURE TIM CURRY.
THIS COMPOSER WROTE THE SCORE FOR BEAUTY AND THE BEAST, HERCULES, AND (BELIEVE IT OR NOT) SAUSAGE PARTY.
THIS WAS THE MAIN CHARACTER FROM DISNEY’S 2000 FILM, DINOSAUR.

final-jeopardy.question: ON MAY 31, WDWNT BROKE THE NEWS THAT WIMBERLY ALLISON TONG & GOO WERE SELECTED AS THE LEAD DESIGNERS FOR A NEW PROJECT THAT WOULD BE BUILT ON TOP OF THE FORMER HOME OF THIS.
